mapper.update:
CREATE TABLE ${_parameter} ( fid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name_ TEXT, code_ TEXT, description_ TEXT,
street_ TEXT, community_ TEXT, longitude_ double, latitude_ double,
origin_address TEXT, similar_address TEXT, standard_address TEXT,
status int, modifier TEXT, update_date Date, update_address TEXT, update_building_code TEXT )
mapper.insert: insert into ${sql_tablename} ( name_, code_, description_, street_, community_, longitude_, latitude_, origin_address, similar_address, standard_address, status, modifier, update_date, update_address, update_building_code ) values ( #{name_}, #{code_}, #{description_}, #{street_}, #{community_}, #{longitude_}, #{latitude_}, #{origin_address}, #{similar_address}, #{standard_address}, #{status}, #{modifier}, #{update_date}, #{update_address}, #{update_building_code} )
mapper.update:
update ${sql_tablename}
name_ = #{new_name_},
code_ = #{new_code_},
description_ = #{new_description_},
street_ = #{new_street_},
community_ = #{new_community_},
longitude_ = #{new_longitude_},
latitude_ = #{new_latitude_},
similar_address = #{new_similar_address},
standard_address = #{new_standard_address},
status = #{new_status},
modifier = #{new_modifier},
update_date = #{new_update_date},
update_address = #{new_update_address},
update_building_code = #{new_update_building_code},
fid = #{fid}
AND status = #{status}
AND modifier = #{modifier}
AND update_date = #{update_date}

update.foreach:
update ${sql_tablename}
name_ = #{newRow.name_},
code_ = #{newRow.code_},
description_ = #{newRow.description_},
street_ = #{newRow.street_},
community_ = #{newRow.community_},
longitude_ = #{newRow.longitude_},
latitude_ = #{newRow.latitude_},
similar_address = #{newRow.similar_address},
standard_address = #{newRow.standard_address},
status = #{newRow.status},
modifier = #{newRow.modifier},
update_date = #{newRow.update_date},
update_address = #{newRow.update_address},
update_building_code = #{newRow.update_building_code},
fid = #{newRow.fid}
